intro: Anotis montholonii, commonly known as the mountain anotis, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. Its leaves are linear and hairy, providing a drought-resistant structure. Anotis montholonii is often found in mountainous regions and is valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens.
